attributes.title: Swamiji's Leela, His Life Is The Greatest Strong Nuclear Force Positive Explosion!
attributes.description:
4 MARCH 2020

MY LEELA, MY LIFE IS ONE OF THE GREATEST STRONG NUCLEAR FORCE POSITIVE EXPLOSION FROM SHRIKAILASA DIRECTLY ON THIS UNIVERSE.MY LIFE IS NOT MADE OF JUST FEW INCIDENTS. HOW WILL YOU WRITE THE HISTORY OF A POWERFUL STRONG NUCLEAR FORCE POSITIVE EXPLOSION? THIS WHOLE UNIVERSE, SUN, PLANET, MOON, EVERYTHING IS THE OUTCOME OF THIS EXPLOSION. ONLY BASED ON THE IMPACT IT LEFT, STORY CAN BE WRITTEN DOWN.

THE HUGE IMPACT I AM MAKING, AND CONTINUE TO MAKE, AND THE TOTALITY OF IT PUT TOGETHER ONLY - MY LIFE CAN BE DESCRIBED. I AM STRONG NUCLEAR FORCE EXPLOSION FROM SHRIKAILASHA DIRECTLY. I AM NEITHER PROUD ABOUT IT, HUMBLE ABOUT IT. I AM NEITHER GOING TO HIDE IT NOR GOING TO OVERSPELL IT, DECORATE IT WITH WORDS. I AM STRAIGHT UNHIDEABLE. HUGE POSITIVE STRONG NUCLEAR FORCE EXPLOSION ON THIS UNIVERSE.

 I AM HERE, TO MAKE YOU ALL EXPERIENCE, MAKE US ALL RADIATE PARAMASHIVA, THE ABSOLUTE AND ULTIMATE CONSCIOUS POSSIBILITY. MY WORDS ARE NEITHER POETRY. PROSE, LOGICAL, MAGICAL OR THEORY OR PHILOSOPHY. I IT STRAIGHT FROM THE HEART OF PARAMASHIVA TO MY DISCIPLE. IT IS FROM PARAMSHIVA'S HEART TO YOUR HEART.

KUPPAMAL USE TO SAY THAT  I AM THE EXPLOSION HAPPENED FROM THE ARUNACHALA LINGA , SHE BROUGHT THE EXPLOSION THROUGH MAHAKALABHAIRAVA. THERE IS A MAHAKALABHAIRAVA WITH 8 HANDS IN ARUNACHALESHWARA TEMPLE. SHE THEN BROUGHT IT TO MY MOTHER'S WOMB. MY MOTHER'S WOMB AND FATHER'S BODY WAS PREPARED AT THE SAME TIME. THEN , MY FATHER'S BODY, THE MALE COMPONENT WAS BROUGHT TO MY MOTHER'S WOMB AND I HAPPENED. 

THAT IS WHY SHE SAYS ON ASHTAMI TITHI, I ASSUMED THIS FORM. WHEN I DID NOT WANT TO ACCEPT ALL THE PROPERTY IN MY NAME LEGALLY, SHE WROTE IT TO THE MAHAKALABHAIRAVA IN ARUNACHALESHWARA. SHE SAID HE WILL PROTECT IT AND GIVE IT TO YOU WHEN YOU ARE READY. EVEN UNTIL NOW, IT IS IN MAHAKALABHAIRAVA'S NAME. I WANT ALL OF YOU TO GO AND HAVE THE DARSHAN OF ARUNCHALESHWARA AND MAHAKALABHAIRAVA. 

I AM THE MOST POWERFUL STRONG NUCLEAR FORCE POSITIVE EXPLOSION. ONLY BASED ON THE EFFECT, IMPACT I CREATE ON ALL OF YOU AND THE UNIVERSE, THE RESULT ONLY CAN BE DESCRIBED AS MY STORY. HOW WILL YOU WRITE THE HISTORY OF LIGHTNING. BASED ON THE IMPACT IT MAKES, YOU PEN DOWN THE HISTORY OF THE LIGHTNING. 

SAME WAY, ONLY JUST BASED ON THE IMPACT. THE DHIVYA SHAREERA I AM MAKING IN EACH ONE OF YOU, ONLY THROUGH THAT - THE COLLECTIVE NARRATION OF THE IMPACT I MAKE ON THIS UNIVERSE CAN BE DESCRIBED, USED TO DETAIL MY STORY. I CAN GIVE YOU SOME INCIDENTS. YOU WILL BE HEARING LOTS OF INCIDENTS FROM MY BLOOD RELATIVE. FRIENDS, AND RELATIVES. EVERY PERSON WHO WALKS IN THE STREET OF TIRUVANNAMALAI WILL HAVE SOME STORY. 

WE HAVE AT LEAST THREE EYE WITNESS , ONE; PERSON WHO MAKES FLOWER GARLAND IN KRITIKAI MANDAPAM ,SECOND; PHOTOGRAPHER WHO TOOK PHOTOGRAPH OF ME AND  THIRD,SON OF RAGHUPATHI YOGI . ALL THESE THREE ARE EYEWITNESS OF ME LEVITATING IN THE AIR. YOU CAN HEAR FROM THEM DIRECTLY. YOU CAN ENJOY THE STORIES AND LEELAS. YOU SHOULD ALL VISIT MY GURU’S SAMADHIS. THE YOGA LINGAM WE INSTALLED ON MY GURUS SAMADHI. VIBHUTHANANDA PURI’S SAMADHI, WE HAVE INSTALLED SHIVALINGAM. THERE ARE SO MANY OTHER PLACES TO BE SEEN IN TIRUVANNAMALAI ASSOCIATED TO MY LIFE. YOU SHOULD ALSO VISIT THE ANANDA GANDA GUHA. THE CAVE THROUGH WITH ARUNAGIRI YOGISHWARA USED TO TAKE ME, HE USED TO TAKE ME THROUGH SAMADHI , WE HAVE ONE PHOTOGRAPHY OF ME SITTING ON THE CAVE. 

THERE IS A NATURAL WATER FOUNTAIN, IT USED TO BE LIVE 365 DAYS, I DON'T KNOW NOW IF IT IS LIVE. AS LONG AS I WAS IN ARUNACHALA, IT WAS THERE. IT WAS GIFT FROM ARUNAGIRI YOGISWARA FOR ME. BECAUSE I USED TO BE THERE EVERY MORNING. 

THE INNOCENT STRAIGHTFORWARD, HEART TO HEART NARRATION FROM THOSE SMALL TOWN VILLAGERS. THOSE DAYS, IT WAS NOT TOWN, IT WAS JUST A LITTLE BIGGER VILLAGE. THE HEART TO HEART NARRATION FROM THOSE VILLAGERS - THAT IS THE AUTHENTICITY OF THE STORY. 

NOTHING CAN CORRUPT THOSE VILLAGERS, HOW MUCH EVER THEY HEAR FROM THE MEDIA, THEY DON'T CARE. THEY DON'T SAY ‘ HE GREW UP HERE’. THEY ALWAYS SAY , ‘ WE BROUGHT HIM UP’. ALL OF THEM HAVE DEFINITELY , DIRECTLY INVOLVED IN BRINGING ME UP.
